column1: In Jayaweera vs.  Asst.  Commissioner of Agrarian Services,  Ratnapura and another2  Jayasuriya J.

column2: "A petitioner who is  seeking relief in  an  application for the issue  of a writ of certiorari  is
not entitled to relief as  a matter of course,  as  a matter of right or as  a matter of routine.
Even  if he  is  entitled  to relief,  still  the  Court  has  a discretion  to  deny  him  relief  having
laches,  waiver,  submission  to  jurisdiction  - are  all  valid

column1: impediments which stand against the grant of relief."
